name: Definitions
text:
[§481H-2]  Definitions.  As used in this chapter:
     "Contaminant" shall be defined as provided in chapter 340E.
     "Water treatment unit" means a product, device, or system designed for personal, family, or household use and for which a claim or claims are made stating that it will improve the quality of water by reducing one or more contaminants through mechanical, physical, chemical, or biological processes or combinations thereof. [L 1991, c 260, pt of §1]
